      • add

        public static Geom.Point3D add(Geom.Point3D gps,
                               Geom.Point3D local_vector_in_meter)
        computes a new point which is the gps point transformed by a 3D vector (in meters)
        Parameters:
        gps - first point3D coordinate
        local_vector_in_meter - the distance in meter from the first point to the second point
        Returns:
        newPoint3D second point3D coordinate

      • find_point

        public static double find_point(double diff_radian,
                                double p)
        Auxiliary function that help the add function to find the point coordinate
        Parameters:
        diff_radian - the radiant distance between the first point and the second point
        p - the type of the wanted parameter(x or y)
        Returns:
        the point coordinate

      • isValid_GPS_Point

        public static boolean isValid_GPS_Point(Geom.Point3D p)
        return true if this point is a valid lat, lon , lat coordinate: [-180,+180],[-90,+90],[-450, +inf]
        Parameters:
        p - Point3D x, y, z coordinates
        Returns:
        true if this point is a valid, false if this point is a invalid
